channel.title: vikings on Gladio Free Europe
channel.description: Recent content in vikings on Gladio Free Europe

item.title: Kievan Rus'
item.description: We venture into the eastern fringes of Europe to look at the origins of Russia, Ukraine, and Belarus: the Kievan Rus'

item.title: The Last Kingdom
item.description: Continuing on the themes discussed in E13, we go back to England and discuss the BBC show The Last Kingdom, and the topic of Viking invasions of the British Isles.
